opinions.snippet:
MARCUS, Circuit Judge-
This is the paradigmatic “hard” case, and we have labored for many months to reach the right result. On appeal, Defendant, Joe’s Stone Crab, Inc. (“Joe’s”), challenges the district court’s entry of judgment in favor of Plaintiff, the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (the “EEOC”), on its gender-based disparate impact claims under Title VII.
